mapper.select: SELECT need.id,need.house_need_rent_num,need.release_time,need.type, house_type.house_type_name,house_type.house_type_id,direction.house_direction_type_name,direction.house_direction_type_id, need.floor,area.min_area,area.max_area,area.house_area_type_name,area.id,fitment.house_fitment_type_name,fitment.house_fitment_type_id, price.`min_price`,price.max_price,price.house_price_range_name as rent,price.house_price_range_id as rent_id,prices.house_price_range_name as buy,prices.house_price_range_id as buy_id,need.remark,need.customer_name,need.phone FROM house_need need LEFT JOIN house_type ON need.house_type_id=house_type.house_type_id LEFT JOIN house_direction_type direction ON need.house_direction_type_id=direction.house_direction_type_id LEFT JOIN house_area_type area ON need.house_area_type_id=area.id LEFT JOIN house_fitment_type fitment ON need.house_fitment_type_id=fitment.house_fitment_type_id LEFT JOIN house_price_range price ON need.rent_house_price_range_id=price.house_price_range_id LEFT JOIN house_price_range prices ON need.buy_house_price_range_id=prices.house_price_range_id WHERE 1=1 AND need.id=#{id}

SELECT house_sell_rent.id,estate_sell_rent_num,release_time,type,house_num,house_type_name, house_direction_type_name,area,house_fitment_type_name, rent_price,sale_price,url,remark,owner_name,owner_tel FROM house_sell_rent LEFT JOIN house ON house_sell_rent.house_id=house.house_id LEFT JOIN house_type ON house.house_type_id=house_type.house_type_id LEFT JOIN house_direction_type ON house_sell_rent.house_direction_type_id=house_direction_type.house_direction_type_id LEFT JOIN house_fitment_type ON house_sell_rent.house_fitment_type_id=house_fitment_type.house_fitment_type_id LEFT JOIN house_pic ON house_sell_rent.id=house_pic.house_sell_rent_id
1=1
